H1_split_answer1:
Great! Here’s a script for a YouTube Shorts video on "The Power of Morning Routines" tailored for young professionals:

---

[Opening shot: Bright morning light streaming through a window]

🎵 [Upbeat music playing]

🗣️ [Voiceover] "Hey there, young professionals! Want to supercharge your day? Let’s talk about the power of morning routines!"

[Cut to a person stretching and smiling]

🗣️ [Voiceover] "Starting your day with intention can boost your productivity and mood. Just 10 minutes of stretching or meditation can set a positive tone!"

[Quick clips of a healthy breakfast being prepared]

🗣️ [Voiceover] "Fuel your body! A nutritious breakfast fuels your brain. Think smoothies, oatmeal, or eggs!"

[Scene of someone writing in a journal]

🗣️ [Voiceover] "And don’t forget to plan! Spend a few minutes journaling or setting your goals for the day. It keeps you focused!"

[Cut to a person getting ready, looking confident]

🗣️ [Voiceover] "Remember, a great morning routine isn’t about perfection; it’s about consistency. Start small and build up!"

[Closing shot: Person walking out the door with a smile]

🗣️ [Voiceover] "So, what’s your morning routine? Share in the comments! Let’s inspire each other!"

🎵 [Music fades out]

---

Feel free to adjust any part of the script to better fit your style!
H1_split_answer2:
Great! Here’s a script for a YouTube Shorts video on "Quick and Healthy Meal Prep Ideas" tailored for college students, keeping it within a 45-second limit:

---

[Opening shot: A busy college campus]

🎵 [Upbeat music playing]

🗣️ "Hey, college students! Struggling to eat healthy with your busy schedule? Let’s dive into some quick and healthy meal prep ideas!"

[Cut to a kitchen scene]

🥗 "First up, **Mason Jar Salads**! Layer your favorite veggies, protein, and dressing at the bottom. Just shake and enjoy!"

[Quick transition to another meal]

🍚 "Next, try **Quinoa Bowls**! Cook a batch of quinoa, add black beans, corn, and avocado. Perfect for a filling lunch!"

[Show a quick clip of meal prepping]

🥙 "Don’t forget **Wraps**! Use whole grain tortillas, fill them with turkey, spinach, and hummus. Roll them up for a grab-and-go meal!"

[Final shot: A fridge stocked with prepped meals]

🕒 "Spend just an hour on the weekend, and you’ll have meals ready for the week! Healthy eating made easy!"

[Closing shot: Subscribe and like button]

👍 "Like and follow for more quick tips! Happy meal prepping!"

🎵 [Music fades out]

--- 

Feel free to adjust any part of the script to better fit your style!
